name: trend-micro-sms
label: Trend Micro SMS
description: Trend Micro SMS(Security Management System) Provides global vision and security policy control for threat intelligence and enables comprehensive analysis and corrections. You can configure it to automatically check for, download, and distribute filter updates to TrendMicro SMS system as well as to take immediate action on events based on yer security policy.

fields.title: Server Address
fields.name: host
fields.description: IP address or FQDN of the Trend Micro SMS server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Authentication Type
fields.name: authentication_type
fields.description: Specify the authentication type as either Basic Auth or API key.

Basic Auth.title: SMS Username
Basic Auth.name: smsuser
Basic Auth.description: SMS Username to access the Trend Micro SMS server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

Basic Auth.title: SMS Password
Basic Auth.name: smspass
Basic Auth.description: SMS Password to access the Trend Micro SMS server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

API Key.title: API Key
API Key.name: api_key
API Key.description: API key configured for your account for using the Trend Micro SMS APIs.

fields.title: Port
fields.name: port
fields.description: Port number of the Trend Micro SMS server.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Import Reputation
operations.description: Imports a file that contains one or more reputation entries, which you want to import into Trend Micro SMS. Trend Micro SMS can upload one file at a time, and each file can contain multiple entries with the same address type.

parameters.title: Import File
parameters.name: input_file
parameters.description: Select the file that you want to import into Trend Micro SMS. Note: All entries in the file must be of the same address type. Following address types can be imported: IPv4, IPv6, DNS, and URL.

parameters.title: Address Type
parameters.name: address_type
parameters.tooltip: Select address type to add entry to database. Default set to IPv4
parameters.description: Address type that you are importing into Trend Micro SMS. This address type is used to add a reputation entry to the database. By default, this is set to IPv4.

operations.title: Add Reputation Entry
operations.description: Add a new reputation entry to the Trend Micro SMS database based on the address tag and values, and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Address Type
parameters.name: address_type
parameters.tooltip: Select address type to add entry to database
parameters.description: Address type to be added to the Trend Micro SMS database. You can select from the following options: IP, DNS, or URL.

parameters.title: Address values
parameters.name: address_value
parameters.tooltip: Enter address values to add into database
parameters.description: Values of the address to be added to the Trend Micro SMS database based on the address type you have selected. For example, if you choose IP, then you can add values such as 1.1.1.1.

parameters.title: Tag Data
parameters.name: tag_data
parameters.tooltip: One or more tag categories and their values.The list values must be separated by ~~~. For example:MalwareIpType,malwareSource~~~cncHost
parameters.description: (Optional) One or more tag categories and their values that you want to add to the reputation entry in the Trend Micro SMS database. The list values must be separated by ~~~. For example: MalwareIpType,malwareSource~~~cncHost

operations.title: Delete Reputation Entries
operations.description: Deletes one or more reputation entries from the Trend Micro SMS database based on the list of IP addresses, URLs, or DNSs, and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: List OF IPs
parameters.name: ip_list
parameters.tooltip: List of IPv4 or IPv6 address of the Reputation entry to delete
parameters.description: List of IPv4 or IPv6 addresses based on which you want to delete the reputation entry from Trend Micro SMS. Note: You must specify either the list of IP addresses, DNSs, or URLs.

parameters.title: List OF DNS
parameters.name: dns_list
parameters.tooltip: List of DNS address of the Reputation entry to delete
parameters.description: List of DNS addresses based on which you want to delete the reputation entry from Trend Micro SMS.

parameters.title: List OF URLs
parameters.name: url_list
parameters.tooltip: Reputation URL entry to delete from database
parameters.description: List of URLs based on which you want to delete the reputation entry from Trend Micro SMS.

parameters.title: Criteria
parameters.name: criteria
parameters.description: Criteria to delete the reputation entry from Trend Micro SMS.  You can choose from the following values: All: Deletes all the reputation entries, including user-defined and RepDV entries. USER: Deletes all user-defined entries. REPDV: Deletes all RepDV entries. ENTRY: Deletes specified entries.

operations.title: Delete Reputation
operations.description: Imports a file that contains one or more reputation entries, which you want to delete from Trend Micro SMS. Trend Micro SMS can upload one file at a time, and each file can contain multiple entries with the same address type.

parameters.title: Import File
parameters.name: input_file
parameters.tooltip: Import a file with Reputation entries to delete from the SMS
parameters.description: Imports a file that contains one or more reputation entries, that you want to delete from Trend Micro SMS. Trend Micro SMS can upload one file at a time, and each file can contain multiple entries with the same address type.

parameters.title: Address Type
parameters.name: address_type
parameters.tooltip: Select address type of values which are present in file to delete entries from database. Default set to IPv4
parameters.description: Address type that you want to delete from Trend Micro SMS. This address type is used to delete the reputation entry from the database. By default, this is set to IPv4.

operations.title: Query Reputation Entries
operations.description: Searches the Trend Micro SMS Reputation database for one or more user reputation entries based on the list of IP addresses, URLs, or DNSs that you have specified.

parameters.title: Address Type
parameters.name: address_type
parameters.tooltip: Select address type to search in database
parameters.description: Type of address that you want to search in Trend Micro SMS database.  You can select from the following options: IP, DNS, or URL.

parameters.title: Address values
parameters.name: address_value
parameters.tooltip: Enter address values to search into database
parameters.description: Values of the address that you want to search for in the Trend Micro SMS database based on the address type you have selected. For example, if you choose IP, then you can add values such as 1.1.1.1.

operations.title: Quarantine IP Address
operations.description: Quarantine an IP address and create a response based on the IP address, policy name, or timeout that you have specified.

parameters.title: IP Address
parameters.description: IP address for the target host that you want to quarantine in Trend Micro SMS database.
parameters.name: ip
parameters.tooltip: IP address for the target host that you want to quarantine in Trend Micro SMS.

parameters.title: Policy Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the policy that should must match an existing SMS Active Response policy name based on which you want to quarantine IP address in the Trend Micro SMS.
parameters.name: policy_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the policy that should must match an existing SMS Active Response policy name based on which you want to quarantine IP address in the Trend Micro SMS.

parameters.title: Timeout
parameters.description: Specify the timeout value based on which you want to quarantine IP address in the Trend Micro SMS. Specified value overrides the default already in the policy. If not specified, the timeout value from the policy is used.
parameters.name: timeout
parameters.tooltip: Specified value overrides the default already in the policy. If not specified, the timeout value from the policy is used.

operations.title: UnQuarantine IP Address
operations.description: Un-quarantine an IP address and close a response based on the IP address, policy name, or timeout that you have specified.

parameters.title: IP Address
parameters.description: IP address for the target host that you want to un-quarantine in Trend Micro SMS.
parameters.name: ip
parameters.tooltip: IP address for the target host that you want to un-quarantine in Trend Micro SMS.

parameters.title: Policy Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the policy that should must match an existing SMS Active Response policy name based on which you want to un-quarantine IP address in the Trend Micro SMS.
parameters.name: policy_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the policy that should must match an existing SMS Active Response policy name based on which you want to un-quarantine IP address in the Trend Micro SMS.

parameters.title: Timeout
parameters.description: Specify the timeout value based on which you want to un-quarantine IP address in the Trend Micro SMS. Specified value overrides the default already in the policy. If not specified, the timeout value from the policy is used.
parameters.name: timeout
parameters.tooltip: Specified value overrides the default already in the policy. If not specified, the timeout value from the policy is used.
